body: Look I'm here to give an idea: Have not thought about doing a tournament, community Avicus has grown a lot and I mean it, people start playing more in the server and this is done most interesting I propose to do? pvp tournament, how to organize, because if I am asked what is the dire, but first give me your opinion as staff of the server, thanks

title: you could make a tournament?

replies.body: We do have tourneys, and teams are being made/have been made already. The tournament is announced one month in advance :3
replies.body_tagged: We do have tourneys, and teams are being made/have been made already. The tournament is announced one month in advance :3

replies.body: They will do a tourney when Ivy has made a  tournament plugin
replies.body_tagged: They will do a tourney when Ivy has made a  tournament plugin

replies.body:
I believe there was a tournament back in McZone. They hosted the matches on private vanilla servers and the moderators and tourney officials recorded the winnings accordingly. Idk though xP

But a tourney plugin would be super helpful

replies.body:
That isn't fully true. I was on a mczone team and we made it to the finals and had a good chance as we were close to the monument (a few players), but then there was a problem and the server crashed. We had to restart the match and we got wrecked the second game losing the match.

(However we still did great)

replies.body: If we do, do a tournament will there be a group stage?
replies.body_tagged: If we do, do a tournament will there be a group stage?

reply_to.body: If we do, do a tournament will there be a group stage?
reply_to.body_tagged: If we do, do a tournament will there be a group stage?

replies.body: And if we have a Tournament we can't "stop" OCN teams from being able to join. You can't have a tariff for OCN teams
replies.body_tagged: And if we have a Tournament we can't "stop" OCN teams from being able to join. You can't have a tariff for OCN teams

replies.body: It would make it funner to have to qualify for knockout rounds though :l
replies.body_tagged: It would make it funner to have to qualify for knockout rounds though :l
